<title level="1" right="Trait">[Wraith](/Traits.aspx?ID=260)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 335</row>

A wraith is an [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature infused with negative energy and driven by a hatred of all life
name: Wraith
